sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import {
  Body,
  CardArticle,
  Container,
  ContainerArticle,
  Header,
  Title,
  Thumbnail,
  TitleArticle,
  Description,
  BodyArticle,
  BodyText,
  CardInfo,
  ContainerEdit,
  Icon,
} from "../styled/Home";
import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";
import { faPencil, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";
import { UseDataContext } from "../context/context";

export default function HomePage() {
  const { auth } = UseDataContext();

  console.log(auth);
  const dados = [
    {
      id: "1",
      title: "Artigo 1",
      description: "Descicao do artigo 1",
      body: "texto completo do artigo",
      create_at: "",
      thumbnail:
        "https://media.glassdoor.com/sqll/3762982/atom6-design-squarelogo-1607449561246.png",
    },
    {
      id: "2",
      title: "Artigo 2",
      description: "Descicao do artigo 2",
      body: "texto completo do artigo",
      create_at: "",
      thumbnail:
        "https://media.glassdoor.com/sqll/3762982/atom6-design-squarelogo-1607449561246.png",
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Container>
      <Header>
        <Title>CRUD</Title>
      </Header>
      <Body>
        <ContainerArticle>
          {dados.map((item, i) => (
            <CardArticle key={i}>
              <Thumbnail src={item.thumbnail} />
              <CardInfo>
                <TitleArticle>{item.title}</TitleArticle>
                <Description>{item.description}</Description>
                <BodyArticle>
                  <BodyText>{item.body}</BodyText>
                </BodyArticle>
              </CardInfo>
              <ContainerEdit>
                <Icon>
                  <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faPencil} />
                </Icon>
                <Icon>
                  <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faTrash} />
                </Icon>
              </ContainerEdit>
            </CardArticle>
          ))}
        </ContainerArticle>
      </Body>
    </Container>
  );
}
